sense.def:
To choose something from the things available
pomeni odločiti se za eno stvar izmed vseh, ki so na voljo.

seg.quote: I had been chosen to be trained as editor.
They undergo training in their chosen professions.

sense.def:
To choose to do something
pomeni nekaj storiti zato, ker želimo ali čutimo, da je prav.

seg.quote: They could fire employees whenever they chose.

sense.def:
Če rečemo, da je med stvarmi
little to choose
ali
not much to choose
, se je težko odločiti, katera stvar je boljša.

seg.quote: There's nothing to choose between the two countries.
